lead_paragraph: MISSISSIPPI.--The Charleston (S. S.) Courier publishes the following extract of a letter " from a gentleman of influence in Mississispi to his friend in Charleston." It gives a more detailed exposition of the issues of the late election than we have seen elsewhere:
